article_title: Pre-Mortem: Hagel Innovation Initiative Is Too Little, And Way Too Late

article_metadata.description: Last weekend, at a California conclave that analyst Byron Callan has aptly called "the Davos of Defense," Secretary of Defense Chuck Hagel unveiled a plan for accelerating military innovation. Hagel and his subordinates have been warning that foreign adversaries are chipping away at the joint force's edge in warfighting technology, [...]
article_metadata.author: Loren Thompson
